name: Dating Lessons
description: Dating Lessons is a dating training course in VR presented by a professional coach teaching dating skills. This comprehensive program consists of 11 lectures and 7 practical interactive sessions which will give a man tools to feel confident and overcome shyness when meeting a woman.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 2500 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 660 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: i5 2500 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 660 Storage: 2 GB available space
